item.description: A structured methodology for accurate and reliable port scanning using Nmap

item.title: Illustrating Cache Key Normalization in Web Cache Poisoning
item.description: An illustrated explanation of cache key normalization in a web cache poisoning context

item.title: Understanding MS-RPC and its Role in Windows Exploitation Tools
item.description: A practical overview of MS-RPC, port 135, and how Windows administration and exploitation tools use it

item.title: About
item.description:
This blog is a collection of my technical notes and research in cybersecurity.
I hope you will find something useful and learn something new :)
